title: Anderson County teen dead in shooting, investigation ongoing
content:
The Anderson County Sheriff’s Office is investigating a possible accidental shooting that was reported around 8:50 p.m. on Dec. 23.
According to Sheriff Greg Taylor, the shooting occurred in the 500 block of ACR 350.
Several individuals were present when the shooting occurred, Taylor said.
"Deputies and investigators arrived at the scene and found a 19-year-old male with a gunshot wound to the head," said Taylor. "Paramedics were attempting to revive him, and he was transported to Palestine Regional Medical Center and then to Trinity Mother Frances in Tyler, where he was pronounced dead."
The case is still under investigation, Taylor said.
The name of the victim has not yet been released.
"This case will be submitted to the Anderson County District Attorney’s office for grand jury review," said Taylor.
